sentences.english: So the number of types of aioli is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 因此蒜泥蛋黃醬的種類將是無窮無盡的。

sentences.english: If you like the yolk of salted eggs, you can insert one in the centre.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜歡鹹蛋黃，你可以在中間加入一個。

sentences.english: Mixed Corn and Grains, Egg Yolk & Lotus Paste, Imperial Pineapple.
sentences.chinese: 五穀雜糧，蛋黃白蓮，至尊鳳梨。

sentences.english: I want to have them sunnyside up.
sentences.chinese: 我要蛋黃在上面的煎蛋。

sentences.english: Crack the eggs and separate yolks from whites, very carefully.
sentences.chinese: 敲開蛋殼，然後小心地把蛋黃從蛋清中分離出來。

sentences.english: Stir in sugar and egg yolk to form a dough, chill for 15 mintues.
sentences.chinese: 拌入糖和蛋黃揉成光滑的麪糰，放入冰箱15分鐘。

sentences.english: Gradually, the sun, which is like a huge egg, is popping out of the clouds slowly.
sentences.chinese: 漸漸地，太陽像一個碩大的雞蛋黃慢慢跳出雲層。

sentences.english: Because each grain of rice is wrapped in egg, it's also called silver wrapped in gold.
sentences.chinese: 因爲每一粒米都包裹着蛋黃，所以也叫金裹銀。

sentences.english: About the mooncake, My mother and I like mooncakes with egg yolk.
sentences.chinese: 說到月餅，我和媽媽最喜歡喫帶有蛋黃的中秋月餅。

sentences.english: Cream together the butter & sugar until smooth; beat in the egg yolks.
sentences.chinese: 將黃油與糖攪拌至順滑，加入蛋黃打勻。

sentences.english: Whisk egg yolks, sugar, lemon juice, lemon peel, and salt in medium metal bowl to blend.
sentences.chinese: 用中號的碗把蛋黃打勻加入糖，檸檬汁，檸檬皮和鹽。

sentences.english: Boiled potato mixed with mayonnaise and chopped bacon bits.
sentences.chinese: 煮土豆配蛋黃醬和培根碎。

sentences.english: The yolk contains all the fat and approximately half of the protein of the egg.
sentences.chinese: 蛋黃含有雞蛋中全部的脂肪和大約一半的蛋白質。

sentences.english: Sift cake flour into the egg yolk mixture.
sentences.chinese: 篩入低筋麪粉入蛋黃漿。

sentences.english: A Red Eye is red beer with an egg yolk floating on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 雞尾酒紅眼睛需要在表面上加一個蛋黃。

sentences.english: Mix together the flour, corn starch and baking powder, then sift into the egg yolk mixture.
sentences.chinese: 麪粉，玉米澱粉和烤粉混合，過篩入蛋黃液中。

definition: plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it
umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
